resources.string:
=======
 Android application to add, edit, delete people, students and teachers, from the local SQLite database. Activity with a few fragments like people list and people editor fragments, using MVP pattern. Asynchronous operations with database. Support device orientation changes. Custom views.
 The project is already on GitHub:
 https://github.com/Golovko-Vitalii/YukonTaskTest
 =======
